class.rdfs:comment: Category of an [[Accommodation]], following real estate conventions, e.g. RESO (see [PropertySubType](https://ddwiki.reso.org/display/DDW17/PropertySubType+Field), and [PropertyType](https://ddwiki.reso.org/display/DDW17/PropertyType+Field) fields  for suggested values).
class.rdfs:label: accommodationCategory
